props.name: aria-label
props.description: Accessible name for the tab list

props.name: aria-labelledby
props.description: ID of the element containing the name for the tab list

props.name: id
props.description: Custom string to use when generating the IDs of tabs and `aria-labelledby` for the panels

props.name: loadingCounters
props.description: Loading state for all counters. It displays loading animation for individual counters until all are resolved. It is needed to prevent multiple layout shift.

props.name: aria-selected
props.description: Whether this is the selected tab. For more information about `aria-selected`, see [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Attributes/aria-selected).

props.name: onSelect
props.description: The handler that gets called when the tab is selected

props.name: counter
props.description: Content of CounterLabel rendered after tab text label

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon rendered before the tab text label
